name: Flying Chick
description:
Oh No! The Flying Chick has lost their mother :(, Help The Flying Chick as they Fly through the busy City!

made with Construct 3 and for BITPOIN

check out my other games if you like this one ;D

(HEAVILY inspired by flappy bird)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Mobile:

tap the screen

Computer:

left click,

spacebar

Controller:

X Button
